content: HomeBlogAndrej Kovacevic Digital Marketing Specialist, TechLoot Andrej Kovacevic Andrej Kovacevic is a digital marketing specialist, founder at TechLoot, and a contributing writer for a variety of other technology-focused online publications. He has covered the intersection of marketing and technology for several years and is pursuing an ongoing mission to share his expertise with business leaders and marketing professionals everywhere.
